title: 415 Christ The Lord, All Power Possessing

lines: 1. Christ, the Lord, all power possessing, Parting, mounted heaven's height, Gracious hands outstretched in blessing, Clouds received Him from their sight. Christ ascended, Christ ascended, Christ ascended on the clouds. Christ ascended on the clouds.

2. Daniel views earth's judgment hour, Angels gathering, open books. God enthroned in flaming power For His Son's arrival looks. Christ approaches, Christ approaches, Christ approaches on the clouds. Christ approaches on the clouds.

3. Revelation's word fulfilling, Trumpet, voices pierce the air. Saint and sinner fainting, thrilling, Every eye behold Him there. Christ is coming, Christ is coming, Christ is coming on the clouds. Christ is coming on the clouds.
